data.text:
We're taking to the skies again! From 22 November to 31 December, we'll be flying between Hong Kong and Singapore quarantine-free* in our first travel bubble! Head over to https://t.co/MrLhcyQo3Z and find inspirations for your next getaway. #LetsFlyAgain!

*T&Cs apply https://t.co/5QiStczQIr
@kartikunited11 We see that your ticket was issued by a third party. Please kindly contact your travel agent for assistance. - Chloe
@irfan_Khan005 Hi there, mind DM us your full itinerary so that we can look it up for you? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

urls.title: Passenger Health & Safety Requirements - Cathay Pacific
urls.description: View the latest passenger health and safety requirements. Learn about mandatory face coverings, health declarations and more.

data.text: @JesseBouman We require passengers to answer health screening questions upon check-in at worldwide airports. You may refer to the details of before you fly here https://t.co/P19CG5lpey - Holly 2/2

@JesseBouman Hi there, we’re taking every measure to reduce your contact and safeguard your health. We would block off seats wherever possible and ask passengers to stay seated and avoid moving around the cabin as much as possible - Holly 1/2
@mihirshah_ajay Hi there, sorry that we are unable to tell due to privacy reason. - Liz
@Shin_Goku7 The redemption service is not available on the app. Please kindly contact the concerned Airlines for redemption.  - Chloe
@untilshesaid Hi there, mind DM us your enquiry so that we can further assist you? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@rezaimamp Sorry that we do no have any direct flight between Hong Kong and Surabaya.  -Vinci

urls.title: Travel Restrictions - COVID-19 Updates - Cathay Pacific
urls.description: There are currently no important alerts. Click "View all "to read our travel advisories. We know travel restrictions may change at short notice. That’s why we’re doing everything we can to keep you up-to-date with current COVID-19 travel requirements to help you plan ahead. Before you travel, make sure to review the latest travel restrictions to ensure you’re eligible to fly. We also highly recommend checking the official government website of your destination country for the latest information. Travel

urls.title: 旅游限制 - 新型冠状病毒病更新信息 - 国泰航空
urls.description: 目前无重要提醒。点击“查看所有”阅读我们的旅行建议。 我们明白旅游限制或会随时更改，因此我们竭尽全力让您了解最新的2019冠状病毒病旅游限制，以助您提前计划行程。为确保您符合资格出行，请於出发前查阅最新的旅游限制。我们亦强烈建议您浏览目的地国家的官方政府网站，以获取最新资讯。

data.text: On planes equipped with High-Efficiency-Particulate Arrestors (HEPA) filters, fresh air enters via the engines and is pumped from the ceiling into the cabins. Used air is sucked out of the cabin below the window seats. Can you guess where the used air eventually exits the plane? https://t.co/IajLEF9eCI

data.text:
If you haven’t stepped out on one of Hong Kong’s many trails, then you don’t know what you’re missing. Open air, incredible views and tranquil space awaits! ⛰ For our fellow Hong Kong hikers, who's your favourite partner to go hiking with?

📸: IG@virginayip https://t.co/TDlOt5suol
@BurcuAltunkaya Hi there, for visa related inquiry, please reach your local embassy for further assistance as they have the most updated information on their end. Thank you - Holly

urls.title: Where We're Flying | Cathay Pacific
urls.description: We’re still flying | Here you’ll find the most up-to-date information regarding our current and upcoming flights.

data.text: @Sushma12558760 You may refer to https://t.co/roX6Jvf5qv for the latest flight schedule. -Vinci

data.text: @kanchigaidesuyo If your flight involves US / Canada, it is required to input personal information. Otherwise airline do not ask for it until you do check-in at the airport / online check-in. -Vinci

A classic member of our fleet, this wide-bodied aircraft can be identified by the notch at the top of each end of its windshield window. Can you guess its model number? 

📸: IG@delhi.aviation https://t.co/EFhsPOotQM
@Ant_sykes83 Hi Antony, since we do not have any news for November yet, please stay tune on our website for the latest news -Elsa

data.text: As part of our commitment to sustainable development, we are proud to be the airline partner of 2019 ChangeMaker Craig Leeson's latest documentary - The Last Glaciers, which explores climate change through a visual story of the world's melting glaciers: https://t.co/yR8hYm4Ep3 https://t.co/ckvja2thtM
Our inflight entertainment system offers a wide range of content, from relaxing jazz 🎶 to the latest blockbusters 🎬. What do you most look forward to when you fly with us? https://t.co/S2bhQcJnbs
@MalcolmLeel Hi there. Mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? Thank you. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@kanchigaidesuyo You're welcome! - Chloe

urls.title: Travel Restrictions - COVID-19 Updates - Cathay Pacific
urls.description: There are currently no important alerts. Click "View all "to read our travel advisories. We know travel restrictions may change at short notice. That’s why we’re doing everything we can to keep you up-to-date with current COVID-19 travel requirements to help you plan ahead. Before you travel, make sure to review the latest travel restrictions to ensure you’re eligible to fly. We also highly recommend checking the official government website of your destination country for the latest information. Travel

data.text:
@kanchigaidesuyo Quarantine is not required for transit in Hong Kong. The rebooking fee will be waived for new tickets purchased up to 31 Oct 20. Fare difference may apply according to the terms and conditions. 
You may check out the transit requirements here: https://t.co/4j9cWt0wK4 - Chloe
@kanchigaidesuyo We will arranged an alternate flight in that case. - Chloe
@BobbySi66836880 Hi there. We replied your DM and provided assist. Thank you. - Anna
@tracywillers Hi there, sorry that for the wait. Mind DM us the email address that you made the booking so that we could further assist?  - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@nickbailey Hi there. Mind providing us eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@dselva76 Hi there, please reach your local embassy for further assistance regarding a repatriation flight. Thank you for your understanding - Holly

@arsyi_alfatin Situation may change from time to time, we recommend you to keep an eye on https://t.co/xJCN9N4RGJ for the latest travel advisories 
-Ella
